[
  {
    "test": {
      "name": "Testing the Rectangle class",
      "givens": [
        {
          "name": "test 1",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "setWidth: 4"
            },
            {
              "name": "setHeight: 9"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "getWidth: 4"
            },
            {
              "name": "getHeight: 9"
            }
          ],
          "thing": {
            "height": 9,
            "width": 4
          }
        },
        {
          "name": "test 2",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "setWidth: 4"
            },
            {
              "name": "setHeight: 5"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "getWidth: 4"
            },
            {
              "name": "getHeight: 5"
            },
            {
              "name": "area: 20"
            },
            {
              "name": "AreaPlusCircumference: 38"
            }
          ],
          "thing": {
            "height": 5,
            "width": 4
          }
        },
        {
          "name": "test 3",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "setHeight: 4"
            },
            {
              "name": "setWidth: 3"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "area: 12"
            }
          ],
          "thing": {
            "height": 4,
            "width": 3
          }
        },
        {
          "name": "test 4",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "setHeight: 3"
            },
            {
              "name": "setWidth: 4"
            },
            {
              "name": "setHeight: 5"
            },
            {
              "name": "setWidth: 6"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "area: 30"
            },
            {
              "name": "circumference: 22"
            }
          ],
          "thing": {
            "height": 5,
            "width": 6
          }
        },
        {
          "name": "test 5",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "setHeight: 3"
            },
            {
              "name": "setWidth: 4"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "getHeight: 3"
            },
            {
              "name": "getWidth: 4"
            },
            {
              "name": "area: 12"
            },
            {
              "name": "circumference: 14"
            }
          ],
          "thing": {
            "height": 3,
            "width": 4
          }
        }
      ],
      "checks": []
    },
    "status": "pass"
  },
  {
    "test": {
      "name": "Testing the LoginPage as react",
      "givens": [
        {
          "name": "Set the email and check the email",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam@email.com"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: adam@email.com"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "Set the email by initial state, then set the email normally, and then check some other stuff",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam@email.com"
            },
            {
              "name": "ThePasswordIsSetTo: secret"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsNot: wade@rpc"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: adam@email.com"
            },
            {
              "name": "ThePasswordIs: secret"
            },
            {
              "name": "ThePasswordIsNot: idk"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "Don't show an email error just because the email does not validate",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "ThereIsNotAnEmailError: undefined"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "Do show an email error after submitting",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheLoginIsSubmitted: undefined"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "ThereIsAnEmailError: undefined"
            }
          ]
        }
      ],
      "checks": []
    },
    "status": "pass"
  },
  {
    "test": {
      "name": "Testing the Redux store",
      "givens": [
        {
          "name": "BDD gherkin style",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam@email.com"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: adam@email.com"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {
            "password": "",
            "email": "",
            "error": "no_error"
          }
        },
        {
          "name": "another feature",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: hello"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsNot: adam@email.com"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {
            "password": "",
            "email": "bob@mail.com",
            "error": "no_error"
          }
        },
        {
          "name": "yet another feature",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: hello"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: aloha"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: aloha"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {
            "password": "",
            "email": "",
            "error": "no_error"
          }
        },
        {
          "name": "OMG a feature!",
          "whens": [],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: "
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {
            "password": "",
            "email": "",
            "error": "no_error"
          }
        }
      ],
      "checks": [
        {
          "feature": "imperative style",
          "whens": {},
          "thens": {}
        }
      ]
    },
    "status": "pass"
  },
  {
    "test": {
      "name": "Testing the ReduxToolkit",
      "givens": [
        {
          "name": "BDD gherkin style",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam@email.comz"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: adam@email.com"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {
            "password": "",
            "email": "",
            "error": "no_error"
          }
        },
        {
          "name": "another feature",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: hello"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsNot: adam@email.com"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {
            "password": "",
            "email": "bob@mail.com",
            "error": "no_error"
          }
        },
        {
          "name": "yet another feature",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: hello"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: aloha"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: aloha"
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {
            "password": "",
            "email": "",
            "error": "no_error"
          }
        },
        {
          "name": "OMG a feature!",
          "whens": [],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: "
            }
          ],
          "initialValues": {
            "password": "",
            "email": "",
            "error": "no_error"
          }
        }
      ],
      "checks": []
    },
    "status": {
      "name": "AssertionError",
      "message": "a nice message: expected 'adam@email.comz' to equal 'adam@email.com'",
      "showDiff": true,
      "actual": "adam@email.comz",
      "expected": "adam@email.com",
      "operator": "strictEqual",
      "stack": "AssertionError: a nice message: expected 'adam@email.comz' to equal 'adam@email.com'\n    at test (/Users/adam/Code/testeranto.ts/tests/Redux+Reselect+React/reduxToolkit.testeranto.test.ts:97:19)\n    at Given.give (/Users/adam/Code/testeranto.ts/index.ts:81:7)\n    at processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:95:5)\n    at async Suite.run (/Users/adam/Code/testeranto.ts/index.ts:38:7)\n    at async Object.runner (/Users/adam/Code/testeranto.ts/index.ts:647:11)\n    at async /Users/adam/Code/testeranto.ts/index.ts:729:11\n    at async Promise.all (index 3)"
    }
  },

          "whens": [],
          "thens": [

            },
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: [object Object]"
            }
          ]

          "name": "default",

              "name": "IClickTheButton: undefined"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: [object Object]"

          "name": "default",

            {
              "name": "IClickTheButton: undefined"

            {
              "name": "IClickTheButton: undefined"

              "name": "IClickTheButton: undefined"

              "name": "IClickTheButton: undefined"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: [object Object]"
            }
          ]
        }
      ],
      "checks": []

    "status": "pass"

    "test": {
      "name": "a classical react component, bundled with esbuild and tested with puppeteer",

              "name": "IClickTheButton: undefined"

          "thens": [

            },
